languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, кто-то из культистов проник сюда и оставил это. Или человек, запуганный ими. Позор мне, что они так легко хозяйничают у нас под носом, но по крайней мере могу вас заверить, что эта метка не опасна".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, кто-то из культистов проник сюда и оставил это. Позор мне, что они так легко хозяйничают у нас под носом, но по крайней мере могу вас заверить, что эта метка не опасна".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, кто-то из культистов проник сюда и оставил это. Или человек, запуганный ими. Позор мне, что они так легко хозяйничают у нас под носом, но по крайней мере могу вас заверить, что эта метка не опасна".

"Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, l'un des cultistes a dû s'introduire ici avant d'y laisser sa marque. À moins qu'il ait forcé quelqu'un à le faire à sa place. J'ai honte à l'idée qu'ils aient réussi à jouer ce tour pendable sous mon nez, mais au moins, je peux vous assurer que ce symbole n'est pas dangereux. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, l'un des cultistes a dû s'introduire ici avant d'y laisser sa marque. À moins qu'il ait forcé quelqu'un à le faire à sa place. J'ai honte à l'idée qu'ils aient réussi à jouer ce tour pendable sous mon nez, mais au moins, je peux vous assurer que ce symbole n'est pas dangereux. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, uno de los sectarios debe de haberse colado aquí a hurtadillas para dejar su marca. O quizá hayan obligado a alguien a hacerlo. Es una infamia que cometan tales fechorías en mis propias narices, pero al menos puedo asegurarle que esta marca no supone ningún peligro».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, uno de los sectarios debe de haberse colado aquí a hurtadillas para dejar su marca. O quizá hayan obligado a alguien a hacerlo. Es una infamia que cometan tales fechorías en mis propias narices, pero al menos puedo asegurarle que esta marca no supone ningún peligro».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、どうやら魔女団の一人がここに忍び込み、この印を残したのでしょう。あるいは、誰かを無理やりにやらせたのかもしれません。このようなことが私の目の届く範囲で行われたことは不名誉なことですが、少なくとも、印自体は危険なものではないのでご安心ください」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、魔女団の誰かがシオン鼻根で個の印を残した音で症。あるいは、誰かに無理やりやらせたのかもしれません。我の目と鼻の先でこのような悪ふざけが起きたというのは恥ずべきことですが、少なくともこの印が危険なものでないことは保証いたします」

languages.text: “舰长大人，肯定是有异端分子偷偷溜进来，留下了这个符号，或者是强迫别的什么人画了这个符号。他们居然敢在我眼皮底下搞这种小动作，这真是让我无地自容。不过我可以向您保证，这个符号并不危险。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，肯定是有异端分子偷偷溜进来，留下了这个符号，或者是强迫别的什么人画了这个符号。他们居然敢在我眼皮底下搞这种小动作，这真是让我无地自容。不过我可以向您保证，这个符号并不危险。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, einer der Kultisten muss sich hier reingeschlichen und diese Markierung hinterlassen haben. Oder er hat jemanden dazu gezwungen. Es ist zwar peinlich, dass sie etwas Derartiges vor meiner Nase wagen, aber ich kann Euch immerhin versichern, dass die Markierung nicht gefährlich ist."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, einer der Kultisten muss sich hier reingeschlichen und diese Markierung hinterlassen haben. Oder er hat jemanden dazu gezwungen. Es ist zwar peinlich, dass sie etwas Derartiges vor meiner Nase wagen, aber ich kann Euch immerhin versichern, dass die Markierung nicht gefährlich ist."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, tarikatçılardan biri görünmeden girip işareti çizmiş olmalı. Belki de birine zorla yaptırmışlardır. Burnumun dibinde böyle şeyler yapabiliyor olmaları kabul edilemez bir durum ama en azından işaretin tehlike teşkil etmediğinden emin olabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, one of the cultists must have sneaked in here and left this mark. Or perhaps they forced someone to do it. It's a disgrace that they can pull such stunts right under my nose, but at least I can assure you that the mark is not dangerous."
